<title level="1" right="Hazard 5" pfs="">[Fireball Rune](/Hazards.aspx?ID=469)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 101 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

An invisible rune creates an invisible, spherical magical sensor with a 20-foot radius.

---

**Stealth**
DC 24 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 22 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (expert) to erase the rune without triggering the sensor, or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1493) (3rd rank; [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=3280) DC 20) to counteract the rune

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Fireball** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=534), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604)) **Trigger** A living creature enters the sensor area; **Effect** The rune detonates a fireball centered on the triggering creature’s square. This is a 3rd-rank [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530) spell that deals 6d6 fire damage (DC 22 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Reflex save).
